version_description:
- NEW OPTION TO IMPORT TO *TIDAL*
- Fixed issues when some songs were not moved to Amazon Music
- Fixed issue when you could not type password for Google Music on smaller screens
- Fixed issue with playlists not being shown for Google Music
- Google Music and Tidal allows you to log in using iOS password manager
- Fixed problem with unmatched songs when importing to Apple Music
Various bugfixes

- Added import FROM AND TO PANDORA
- Fixed issue when you could not login to Google Music

- Amazon changed their API so we had to update it, sorry for any inconveniences. It works now!
- Fixed various bugs in other importers.

In case of problems, please send us an email to contact@freeyourmusic.com
- New option to import to and from Groove Music.
Various bugfixes

** GOOGLE MUSIC fixed **
Apologies to everyone that had a trouble to log in to Google Music in Stamp. We were working really hard on the fix and it is finally here.

We have also fixed the issue with Pandora when the app crashed if you had an empty playlist.
Fixed ugly Pandora bug, you will be able to finally see all your saved stations!
- Fixed import to Amazon! (however due to Amazon Music api, it is slow)

- Bugfixes.
- Support for iPhone X

- UX fixes for iPhone X.
- Minor improvements.
Fixed missing login screen while selecting Amazon Music

We are constantly working on improving the app, in case of any troubles please contact us via email.
support@freeyourmusic.com

- New API for Amazon Music implemented.

Please report any bugs you find or problems with app functionality to support@freeyourmusic.com
Cheers, Stamp Team!
- Fixes Amazon integration for US & CA customers.
Added option to import music from Deezer!

- Fixed import from YouTube.
- Various improvements.
Better error reporting for YouTube login.
Added option to import music from Deezer!
- Updated Spotify login method
- Fixed crash when importing to Spotify
- Fixed: importing to Spotify created empty playlists
- Fixed Spotify login on smaller phones
- Fixed issues with Spotify login
Fixes problem with Spotify and issue with deleted shared playlists on Google Music.

- Fixed issue with Pandora import
- Fixed issues with import from Spotify
- Fixes problems with import from Spotify for some users.
Changed the way of logging in to Spotify as we users had problems with it.
- Fixed problem with logging in to Spotify.
- Final fix for Spotify logging in issues.
- Fixed Amazon login.
- Fix import from and to Amazon Music for US/CA and EU markets.

- Added import TO YouTube!
- Fixed import to Apple Music

- Fixes problem with importing from Amazon music.
- Fixes problem with logging it to Spotify
- Various bug fixes.
- Fixed login to Amazon Music, Google Music & Tidal.
Fixed login to Amazon Music
Fixed issues with Spotify login
Fixed transfer to and from Apple Music.
- Fixed issues with moving playlist to & from Amazon Music
- Fixed login to Tidal

*NEW auto-sync functionality*
FreeYourMusic app will now sync all your playlists automatically in the background, check it out!

*Bug fixing*
For past months there were issues with login to different music streaming services.
We have spent significant amount of time rewriting how the app communicates with music platforms and finally we can be super proud how it works.

In case of any issues, please contact our support@freeyourmusic.com

- Fixed Amazon Music login for US customers
- Fixed the case when processing transfers got stuck
- Fixed selecting playlists from Apple Music for some users
- Added status what app is doing
- Added option to pause/resume transfer
- Added option to remove playlist transfer

We are constantly fixing all issues around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

* NEW Google Play Music *
- Reimplemented how log in works, so finally you can use it with 2-factor authentication!
- It is still alpha version, please report any issues with Google Play Music to support@freeyourmusic.com and we will fix it asap.

Also:
- Fixed Amazon Music login for US customers and Apple Music integration
- Added option to pause and remove playlist transfer

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

* NEW Google Play Music *
- Reimplemented how log in works, so finally you can use it with 2-factor authentication!
- It is still alpha version, please report any issues with Google Play Music to support@freeyourmusic.com and we will fix it asap.

Also:
- Fixed Amazon Music login for US customers and Apple Music integration
- Added option to pause and remove playlist transfer

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

- Fixed issues where some users could not transfer songs
- Ability to export failed songs as CSV

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

- Fixed issues where some users could not transfer songs
- Ability to export failed songs as CSV

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

*New Services added*
- Amazon Prime
- SoundCloud
- Qobuz

Additionally:
- Select All functionality in collections picker
- New settings page with option to logout from connected account
- Added notification about logged out accounts (with option to re-login)
- Fixed Google Music wrong response error
- Fixed missing data when logging in to Amazon

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

*NEW SERVICES*
- QQ Music

Fixes:
- Problem with transfer being stuck for Amazon playlists with more than 500 tracks
- Fixed crash at the start of the app for some users
- Fixed Google Music being logged out when transfer starts
- Transfer no longer stuck on pending if playlist has 0 tracks

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

*NEW SERVICES*
● QQ Music
● Yandex Music (Яндекс Музыка)

Fixes:
● Problem with transfer being stuck for Amazon playlists with more than 500 tracks
● Fixed crash at the start of the app for some users
● Fixed Google Music being logged out when transfer starts
● Transfer no longer stuck on pending if playlist has 0 tracks

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

*NEW SERVICES*
● QQ Music
● Yandex Music (Яндекс Музыка)

Fixes:
● Problem with transfer being stuck for Amazon playlists with more than 500 tracks
● Fixed crash at the start of the app for some users
● Fixed Google Music being logged out when transfer starts
● Transfer no longer stuck on pending if playlist has 0 tracks

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

*NEW SERVICES*
● YouTube Music
● Anghami

Fixes:
● Got rid of few minor bugs reported by users

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

*New services*:
- Napster
- VK Music

When creating new transfer you can choose to use existing playlists (as long as the name is the same) or create new ones!

Also...
● Google Music & YouTube Music authentication fixes
● Tidal authentication fixes
● Amazon Unlimited is correctly recognised and more songs should be matched
● SoundCloud now allows to import liked playlists & tracks
● Google Music now allows to import My Library (liked songs)

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

- Fixed Anghami
- For music services which limit number of songs in playlists
- Fixed a bug which prevented some transfers to get stuck or add duplicate songs, when there was same song in separate playlists
- Fixed transfers to Amazon Music being stuck
- Fixed few issues which made the app crash for some users


Also...
● New services: Napster, VK Music
● When creating new transfer you can choose to use existing playlists (as long as the name is the same) or create new ones!

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● Amazon allows to transfer liked (followed) playlists now
● VK correctly parses cyrillic names
● Google Play Music will no longer report "Playlist was removed" when you are logged out
● Fixed fetching My Library from Google Play Music being stuck

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● Fixed crash when importing YouTube Music
● Improved Deezer authentication flow (added support for sub-accounts)
● Added ability to import Deezer liked songs

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● *NEW* FYM supports importing ALBUMS now!
● Fixed crash when importing YouTube Music
● Support for Spotify 10k songs limit per playlist

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● *NEW* Gaana is supported now!
● Fixed creating Spotify albums

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● *NEW* JioSaavn support added!

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● Fix: Apple Music login issues has been fixed.
● Fix: The app can handle the case when source playlist was deleted.
● New: Added support for universal links for easier app activation.

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● New: Added option to share discount code with friends for paid users and earn rewards!

● Fix: Fixparsing albums in YouTube Music no longer crashes the app for some users
● Fix: Improved matching algorithm (less missing songs)
● Fix: If Deezer hits the limit of songs in a playlist, it will create another one to fit all library into Deezer.
● Fix: Deezer shows correctly liked playlists now.

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● New: Add the ability to fetch liked playlists from services: Anghami, Gaana, Napster, QQMusic, VK, Yandex
● Fix: No more Zvuk error during fetching empty library
● Fix: Apple Music will handle albums correctly now

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● [New] Ability to select existing playlist instead of creating new one

● Fix: Fixed issue with Tidal reporting missing cookies
● Fix: Potentialy fixed issue with YouTube Music & Google Play Music login: Browser is insecure
● Few UX improvements

We are fixing bugs around the clock, if you have an issue, please reach out to us at support@freeyourmusic.com

● Fix: Fixed issues with login to Spotify (via Facebook/Apple/Google)

● Tidal allows to login to multiple accounts now
● [DevTrivia] Migrated the app internal database to new Realm MongoDB

● Fixed deeplink implementation that crashed the app
